comments.body: This line was not covered in the original code, which is a bit surprising to me. We can probably address it in a different PR. Just want to keep a note here.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@      def combine(x: B, y: B): B = f(fa.combine(g(x), g(y)))
      override def combineAll(bs: TraversableOnce[B]): B =
        f(fa.combineAll(bs.map(g)))
    }
